tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had knee pain after playing badminton.
Visited Dr Kundan after getting reference from a colleague.
The doctor listened patiently to my problem and advised MRI.
After medicine and physiotherapy I'm back to playing badminton again.
Highly recommended.
Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from severe lower back pain with sciatica. I visited the doctor after trying home remedies which were of no use.
The doctor listened to the complaints in detail, performed a few physical tests and confirmed it was a disc related issue in the lower back.
After a few days of treatment and posture training, I have not felt similar pains for the past 2 months.
Would strongly recommend for any orthopaedic issues.
Thank you.

My name is Anusha I visited Dr kundan sir for my mother knee pain..He is very frndly and kind hearted surgeon.. he explained very clearly abt the condition after consulting him she is better now and doing all her activities without pain..I recommend him for any ortho problem..thankyou soo much kundan sir

I had visited for thumb pain after playing cricket. Was diagnosed with ulnar collateral ligament sprain of the thumb. Feeling much better after treatment. Now going to resume playing after the exercise program.
Would recommend for sports injury.
Brilliant Doctor! Very friendly listens everything patiently and does correct diagnosis! Very much recommended!

Was suffering from knee pain after an injury while playing football. Visited multiple orthopaedic doctors, but to no help. 
Finally, with a colleague's reference, visited Dr Kundan. He listened to my issues. Performed physical tests and suspected a quadriceps tendon tear. I was advised to get MRI which showed a partial tear in quadriceps tendon.
He prescribed PRP stem cell injection. 
Got the treatment done.
After 2 months of rehab, I'm back to training for sports 
Thank you.

Visited for shoulder pain after playing cricket. 
The doctor listened to the complaint patiently, performed physical tests and prescribed medication and precautions to be taken. Started feeling better next day onwards.
I'm back to playing sports again after 3 weeks of precautions.

Very friendly. Accurate diagnosis. Showed utmost care.
Would recommend for any sports related injury or joint issues.

I am athlete. I had a huge cramp on my calf muscle. It was difficult to walk, stand and get up. I consulted Dr. Kundan for the same. i was back on my training within few days of his treatment. Thank you so much doctor.
**** ******* Highly recommended others.Everything explained in details with reasonable treatment and guidance.
